00023 #include "cscheduler.h"
00024 
00025 // forward declarations
00026 class cSimulation;
00027 class cMessage;
00028 class cParsimPartition;
00029 class cParsimCommunications;
00030 
00051 class cParsimSynchronizer : public cScheduler
00052 {
00053   protected:
00054     cParsimPartition *partition;
00055     cParsimCommunications *comm;
00056 
00057   public:
00061     cParsimSynchronizer() : cScheduler()  {partition = NULL; comm = NULL;}
00062 
00066     virtual ~cParsimSynchronizer() {}
00067 
00071     virtual void setContext(cSimulation *sim, cParsimPartition *seg, cParsimCommunications *co)
00072        {setSimulation(sim); partition = seg; comm = co;}
00073 
00077     virtual void startRun() = 0;
00078 
00082     virtual void endRun() = 0;
00083 
00087     virtual cMessage *getNextEvent() =0;
00088 
00095     virtual void processOutgoingMessage(cMessage *msg, int procId, int moduleId, int gateId, void *data) = 0;
00096 };
